title: How to Make a Virtual Notepad on a Nintendo DS

steps.headline: Download DS Organize.
steps.description: Try typing it in on Google.

steps.headline: Open DS Organize and click Browser.
Push the right button and press A.
Type in the name of the file and put .ini after it.
Click on the folder and push the right button and press A.
Type in the name of the folder and put .ini after it.
Go back to the folder and look and edit it when you need to.

text: Download DS Organize. Try typing it in on Google. Open DS Organize and click Browser.  Push the right button and press A.  Type in the name of the file and put .ini after it.  Press A.  Click on the folder and push the right button and press A.  Type in the name of the folder and put .ini after it.  Press A.  Click it and start typing.  Push A when you're done.  Go back to the folder and look and edit it when you need to.
